title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, providing a thin wrapper over the HTTP API for Node.js and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, offering both synchronous and asynchronous APIs to interact with the local server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders for use in chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’) that offers ChatGPT-like interface, model management, and RAG plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama, allowing JVM applications to generate, chat, and manage models via a fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem that exposes the complete Ollama REST API with idiomatic Ruby objects and helpers.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line tool written in Go that adds interactive chat, conversation history, and prompt templates on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Neovim plugin that brings local AI code completion via Ollama, with inline suggestions and customizable prompts.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat application that connects to a local Ollama instance over fetch-streams for real-time responses.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by the community that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of copy-paste curl snippets for every Ollama API endpoint, useful for quick testing and CI scripts.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose files for running Ollama server plus web UI with GPU or CPU-only configurations.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector and horizontal pod autoscaler.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm distribution of the official ollama-js client, updated automatically on every release.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI package for ollama-python, installable via pip and kept in sync with the GitHub releases.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG example that combines Ollama embeddings, Chroma vector store, and Llama-2 for question answering over PDFs.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Lightweight Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into threads, supporting slash commands and per-guild model selection.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama slash command for chatting with local models and optionally logs conversations.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local AI assistance into notes via Ollama, with custom prompts and template variables.
